message: Let's divide it fairly, I'll take 60%
That's a bit greedy Alice! How about a more even split this time?
Let's meet in the middle, 58% for me is a good compromise
The clock is ticking, Alice. This is a fair offer, take it while you can still get a decent amount!
Come on Bob, don't be stubborn! 56% for me is a good deal considering the inflation
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical option. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
